attributes.action: Leave the EU without a second referendum or people's Vote
attributes.additional_details: Leave the EU by the best deal available, or by No Deal. We do not want a second referendum or people's vote. As elected MPs, they should represent their constituents and not take their own personal views into account to try and put a stop to Brexit. We voted out, respect our deomcractic right to vote!!
attributes.background: The people voted to leave the EU by way of Referendum in 2016. We do not want another referendum or people's vote. The Government needs to respect the will of the people and democracy. Politicians to respect the vote of the people and put aside their personal views and political agendas.
